name: Starfighter Arduxim
description:
Free multiplayer is available in the demo!

Strap into the cockpit of your Arduxim fighter and take on enemy starships in this first-person tactical space shooter. Navigate through dangerous ice crystal fields, take hyper gates to other systems, take on enormous capital ships and more.

Includes:
  • A twelve mission story based campaign covering your first tour of duty on the front lines
  • Multiplayer to test your skills against other pilots and AI bots
  • Survival/horde challenge mode with online leaderboard
  • Tutorial
  • Practice mode

Starfighter Arduxim requires a gamepad, joystick or HOTAS. Controls are fully customisable.
